direct_message.type.0: Sorry, mellow deemed that you met the requirements of a server-defined ban action, and automatically banned you, please see below for details.
direct_message.type.1: Sorry, mellow deemed that you met the requirements of a server-defined kick action, and automatically kicked you, you may rejoin anytime with an invite link, please see below for details.

If you believe this was a mistake, contact server staff if possible.
If you believe mellow got this wrong, please [contact support](<https://discord.com/invite/rs3r4dQu9P>).
